hero.title: Live Under the Lordship of Jesus
hero.subtitle: We exist to make mature disciples who proclaim the Kingdom, form counter-cultural community, and carry Kingdom influence into every sphere of society.

scripture.quote: The time is fulfilled, and the kingdom of God is at hand; repent and believe in the gospel.

values.title: Kingdom Values

cards.title: Proclaim the King
cards.description: Salvation initiates people into a new rule, not just a future destination. We announce Jesus as Lord over all creation.

cards.title: Make Disciples
cards.description: We're forming mature followers of Jesus who live under His lordship and reproduce that life in others.

cards.title: Counter-Cultural Community
cards.description: The church is an embassy of the Kingdom, embodying an alternative society that demonstrates Kingdom life.

cards.title: Kingdom Influence
cards.description: We equip believers to carry Kingdom authority into every domain: work, family, culture, and society.

pathway.title: From Seeker to Sent One

steps.title: Explore
steps.description: Investigate who Jesus is and what His Kingdom means.

steps.title: Enter
steps.description: Surrender to Jesus as Lord and become a Kingdom citizen.

steps.title: Grow
steps.description: Be formed through Scripture, community, and practice.

steps.title: Advance
steps.description: Carry Kingdom influence and make disciples who make disciples.

cta.title: Begin Your Journey
cta.description: Whether you're exploring faith for the first time or ready to go deeper, there's a place for you.
